introduction: SYNOPSISThe man who works at a regional branch of a transportation company suffers from persisting nightmares and his beautiful wife sympathize him. The man observes himself from the third person's point of view in his dreams. He hopes to compensate his guilt by abusing his wife. As his alter egos incarnated as a boy and a girl pours out the conflict for their limitations his wife brings night snack for him. He takes her to the bathroom to express his feeling. He wakes up from the dream and his confusion discloses as a stroke.故事一个在运输公司当地运输公司工作的中年男子每天晚上都被恶梦呕吐。Mimo的妻子为她不稳定的丈夫积极表达爱意，并感到悲伤。在梦中的人，第一个通过第三方的眼光观察自己的生活。Danghwanggam从而房子之一，并会获得赔偿DESEO否认自己有罪好妻子。在深刻的心理小吃的空间，当它们不同的外观男性和女性托罗限制的，代表包含Office的妻子有yacham。爱的极端表现是疯狂的，他的妻子拖进卫生间中的困惑当你想要的时候，你就打破了梦想，你的公司的混乱，不容易与现实联系起来，就是一种癫痫发作。
